item.description:
Akashic Reords: Beinning Class Practioner Certification

March 30 & 31 
Friday 6:30 – 9:30 PM & Saturday 10 AM – 5 PM
Cost: $150

According to quantum physicist Ervin Laslo, the Akashic Records are an electromagnetic imprint of everything that’s ever happened in the universe. According to Edgar Cayce, they are the Book of Life, the records of every soul’s journey throughout all time. Whether you come from a scientific or spiritual perspective or both, the loving energy of the Records is deeply healing. This day and a half beginning class with spiritual teacher and healer Christina Cross, coming to us from Chicago, prepares you to do work in your own Records and the Akashic Records of others. With loving support and personal guidance, Christina helps you understand how to work in your own Records for a clearer connection with Source, and to gain supportive insight, guidance and wisdom for your own evolution.

**Please, no alcohol or recreational drugs 24 hours before class.**

To register for the workshop, call Joe: 508-818-8550.

group.name: The First Spiritualist Church of Quincy

item.name: Akashic Records Class w/ Christina Cross (Friday Evening & Saturday Morn/Aft.)
